title: Nordest Britango 3 Hardtail Pre Order
content:
Nordest’s Britago platform got new colors for 2024 but maintains its tried and true all-mountain hardtail geometry numbers.

The Britango frame, named after the Britango vulture (Neophron percnopterus), is the smallest of the Iberian vultures, features 425mm ultra short chainstays, 29er wheels and 75º seat tube angle for fast climbing, is designed for 27.5″, 2.8″ or 29″, 2,6″ wheels, a long top tube, and a 65º head tube angle for 140mm fork, and is designed to be run with a 40mm stem.

It is available in black or white gloss at an introductory pre-order price of 649,00 €, with shipping included in the EU. See more at Nordest.

The post Nordest Britango 3 Hardtail Pre Order appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
